title: Can you stop buffing Tristana Riot?
body:
Holy fuck.

I swear she got at least 4 different buffs in the last 5 patches.

Can we buff other champions who trully need some help now instead of trying to get this fucking yordle back into the meta?

I honestly don't remember the last time I saw a Nocturne.

And the bad thing about Nocturne is that he does have a unique niche so people always assume he is good but never ever actually pick him because he is the most situational fucking champion in the game.
